keyMoments.description: The crew watches in shock as Luffy combines Gear 2 and Gear 3 for the first time to defeat Moria
keyMoments.significance: Witnesses a major evolution in their captain's fighting abilities and the extreme risks he takes to save everyone

keyMoments.description: Multiple crew members begin vanishing in the sunlight as dawn arrives, creating a cliffhanger
keyMoments.significance: Despite victory over Moria, the crew still faces mortal danger from the returning shadows arriving just as dawn breaks

keyMoments.description: Captain Lola stands with her crew despite being shadowless and facing death at dawn, demonstrating extraordinary loyalty and courage
keyMoments.significance: Shows the strong bonds between Lola and her crew, and the pirate code of never abandoning one's nakama

keyMoments.description: The crew celebrates as their shadows are returned when Moria is defeated
keyMoments.significance: The crew is saved from certain death and can finally leave Thriller Bark
